	body#layout .navbar {
		position: relative !important;
	}
	body#layout div#Blog2, body#layout #Blog1{
		display:block;
	}
	  
  

    
 
 

<style><!-- /* 
/*
<Group description="theme Color">
	<Variable name="themeColor" description="navigation header colors" type="color" default="#2b2631" value="#2b2631"/>
</Group>

*/

/* Variable */
:root{
--oswald-font: 'Oswald', sans-serif;
--main-bg-color : $(themeColor);
--semi-gray: #919191;
--transition-1: all .1s ease;
--border-white: #eceff1;

}

/* Font */

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Oswald';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 200;
  font-display: swap;
  src: url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/oswald/v40/TK3iWkUHHAIjg752GT8G.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02BB-02BC, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2122, U+2191, U+2193, U+2212, U+2215, U+FEFF, U+FFFD;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Oswald';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  font-display: swap;
  src: url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/oswald/v40/TK3iWkUHHAIjg752GT8G.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02BB-02BC, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2122, U+2191, U+2193, U+2212, U+2215, U+FEFF, U+FFFD;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Oswald';
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-display: swap;
  src: url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/oswald/v40/TK3iWkUHHAIjg752GT8G.woff2) format('woff2');
  unicode-range: U+0000-00FF, U+0131, U+0152-0153, U+02BB-02BC, U+02C6, U+02DA, U+02DC, U+2000-206F, U+2074, U+20AC, U+2122, U+2191, U+2193, U+2212, U+2215, U+FEFF, U+FFFD;
}


/*Global CSS */

body {
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	color: #2b2631;

}

body.darkMode {
    background-color: var(--main-bg-color);
    color: var(--bs-white);
}

.onIndex .cardPost .cardContentTitle, .onIndex .cardPost p, .onPost .tableOfContainer a, .sharePreview .previewTitle, .authorInfo .authorAbout{
	display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-line-clamp: 3;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    overflow: hidden;
    line-height: 1.5;

}


#mainContent .mainWrapper a {
	text-decoration: none;
	transition: color .15s ease-in-out;
	-webkit-transition: color .15s ease-in-out;
	color:inherit;
}

#headline{
    position: relative;
}

/*Header Navigation */

#header-wrapper {
	box-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgb(255 255 255 / 20%);
    z-index: 20;
    top: 0;
	position: -webkit-sticky;
	position: sticky;
	background-color: var(--main-bg-color);
}

#header-wrapper ul {
    list-style: none;
	margin: 0 ;
	padding: 0;
	display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
}

#header-widget {
    display: flex;
	justify-content: space-between;
	padding-top: 0.3rem;
    padding-bottom: 0.3rem;
    transition-duration: .25s;
	-webkit-transition-duration: .24s;
}

#header-widget>* {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}

/* nav toggle */

.nav-toggle {
	cursor: pointer;
    height: 10px;
    left: 16px;
	right: unset;
    position: fixed;
   	top: calc(1.1005rem + 1.1vw);
    width: 21px;
    z-index: 1051;
	transition: top .25s ease 0s;
	-webkit-transition: top .25s ease 0s;
}
.nav-toggle:hover {
  	opacity: 0.8;
}
.nav-toggle.top {
	top: 18px;	
}
.nav-toggle .nav-toggle-bar,
.nav-toggle .nav-toggle-bar::after,
.nav-toggle .nav-toggle-bar::before {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0%;
    -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%);
    -ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    background: var(--bs-white);
    content: "";
    height: 4px;
    transition: all 0.5s;
	-webkit-transition: all 0.5s;
    width: 100%;
	border-radius: 0.10rem;
}
.nav-toggle .nav-toggle-bar {
  	margin-top: 0;
}
.nav-toggle .nav-toggle-bar::after {
    margin-top: -6px;
}
.nav-toggle .nav-toggle-bar::before {
  	margin-top: 10px;
}
.nav-toggle.expanded .nav-toggle-bar {
  	background: transparent;
}
.nav-toggle.expanded .nav-toggle-bar::after, .nav-toggle.expanded .nav-toggle-bar::before {
  	background: var(--bs-white);
 	margin-top: 0;
}
.nav-toggle.expanded .nav-toggle-bar::after {
  	-ms-transform: rotate(45deg);
  	-webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);
  	transform: rotate(45deg);
}
.nav-toggle.expanded .nav-toggle-bar::before {
  	-ms-transform: rotate(-45deg);
  	-webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg);
  	transform: rotate(-45deg);
}

@media (min-width: 1200px){
	.nav-toggle{
		top:1.9rem;
	}
}

/* widget header1 */

#Header1 h1 {
	margin: 0;
	transition: var(--transition-1);
	-webkit-transition: var(--transition-1);
}

#Header1 .headerTitle {
    color: var(--bs-white) !important;
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    text-transform: uppercase;
	font-weight: 100;
}

#Label1, #Header1{
    padding-left: 3rem;
}

/* widget label1 */

#Label1 {
	width: 100%;
	justify-content: flex-start;
}

#Label1 li {
    padding-right: 1.5rem;
}

#Label1 li a {
    color: var(--bs-white) !important;
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* Mini Header Scroll */

.mini-header #header-widget {
    padding: 0;
}

.mini-header #Header1 {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
}

.mini-header #Header1 h1, .mini-header #Header1 h2{
    font-size: 1.8rem;
}

.mini-header #Label1{
    display: none;
}

/* switch dark mode */

.switch {
  display: none;
}
.switch + div {
  position: relative;
  width: 35px;
  height: 35px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  overflow: hidden;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 200ms ease-in;
}
.switch + div .moon,
.switch + div .sun {
  position: absolute;
  top: 15%;
  left: 15%;
  width: 30px;
  height: 30px;
  transition: all 350ms cubic-bezier(0.51, 0.37, 0.26, 0.87);
  transform-origin: 50% 100%;
}
.switch + div .moon {
  color: var(--bs-white);
  opacity: 0;
  transform: rotate(90deg);
}
.switch + div .sun {
  color: var(--bs-white);
}
.switch:checked + div .moon {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: rotate(0);
}
.switch:checked + div .sun {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: rotate(-90deg);
}

/* widget mobile navigation */

@media (max-width: 767.98px){
	#Label1 {
		display:none;
	}
	#Header1 {
		width:100%;
    	padding: 0;
    	text-align: center;
    	display: block;
		order:2;
	}
	.nav-toggle {
		left: unset;
    	right: 16px;
	}
}


/* Hover Effect */

.link {
	position: relative;
}
.link--metis:hover::before {
	transform-origin: 0% 50%;
	transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
}
.link--metis::before {
	transform-origin: 100% 50%;
	transform: scale3d(0, 1, 1);
	transition: transform 0.3s;
	-webkit-transition: transform 0.3s;
}
.link::before {
    content: '';
}
.link::before, .link::after {
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1px;
    background: currentColor;
    top: 100%;
    left: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
}


/* outcanvas like sidebar alternatife */

#outCanvas {
    width: 20%;
	background-color: var(--main-bg-color);
}
.offcanvas.show {
    transform: none !important;
}
#outCanvas ul{
	list-style: none;
	padding: 0;
	margin: 0;
}

#outCanvas a {
    color: var(--bs-white) !important;
}

#outCanvas #outcontent {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

/* widget BlogSearch1  */

#BlogSearch1 {
    padding-top: 3rem;
	padding-bottom: 3rem;
}

#BlogSearch1 h1 {
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    font-weight: bold;
    color: var(--bs-white);
}
#BlogSearch1 input {
    border-top-left-radius: 0.15rem;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0.15rem;
}
#BlogSearch1 button {
    border-top-right-radius: 0.15rem;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 0.15rem;
}
#BlogSearch1 button, #BlogSearch1 input {
    background-color: var(--bs-white);
    border: 1px solid var(--bs-white);
}
#BlogSearch1 button:focus, #BlogSearch1 input:focus{
    box-shadow: unset ! important;
	border-color: var(--bs-white) !important;
}
#BlogSearch1 svg {
    filter: brightness(0);
}

/* widget Label2  */

#Label2 {
   flex: auto;
}
#Label2 ul {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-evenly;
}
#Label2 li {
    width: 50%;
}
#Label2 h5 {
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
}

#LinkList2 li {
    font-size: small;
    font-family: var(--bs-font-monospace);
}
@media (max-width: 767.98px){
	#outCanvas{
		width:100%;
		transform: translateX(100%);
   		}
	.mainWrapper > .modal-backdrop.show {
    	opacity: 1 !important;
		background-color: var(--main-bg-color);
		}
}
@media (max-width: 575.98px){
	 #Label2 li{
		width: 100%;
		}

}

/* widget Blog1 onIndex */

.onIndex #Blog1 {
    padding-top: 3rem;
    padding-bottom: 3rem;
    padding-right: 1.5rem;
    padding-left: 1.5rem;
	width: 100%;
    margin-right: auto;
    margin-left: auto;
}

.onIndex .blog-posts {
    display: flex;
    align-items: stretch;
    --bs-gutter-x: 1.5rem;
    --bs-gutter-y: 1.5rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-top: calc(var(--bs-gutter-y) * -1);
    margin-right: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * -.5);
    margin-left: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * -.5);
}
.onIndex .blog-posts>* {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    width: 100%;
	flex-shrink: 0;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
    padding-right: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5);
    padding-left: calc(var(--bs-gutter-x) * .5);
    margin-top: var(--bs-gutter-y);
}

.onIndex .cardPost {
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: center center;
    background-size: cover;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    background-color: var(--semi-gray);
    height: 100%;
    box-shadow: 0 1rem 3rem rgba(0,0,0,.175)!important;
    background-clip: border-box;
	
}
.onIndex .cardContent {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    height: 100%;
    padding: 1rem;
    background-color: #000000c7;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    background-clip: border-box;
	
	
}
.cardContentTitle:before{
	content: attr(data-text);
}

.cardContent a{
	text-shadow: 0 0.125rem 0.25rem rgb(0 0 0 / 25%);
    color: var(--bs-white);
}
.onIndex .cardPost .cardContentTitle, .onIndex .cardPost p {

	opacity: 80%;
	color:var(--bs-white);
}
.onIndex .cardPost .cardContentTitle {
	font-weight: 700;
    padding-top: 3rem;
    margin-top: 3rem;
    font-size: 2rem;
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.onIndex .cardPost p {
    padding-bottom: 3rem;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
	padding-right: 0.5rem;
	flex: auto;
	    font-size: 11pt;
}
.onIndex .postAuthorName{
	color: var(--bs-white);
	opacity: .7;
    font-size: 10pt;
    align-self: center;
}

.homeLabel:before {
    content: '\2022';
    margin: 0 5px;
}
.author a {
    text-transform: uppercase;
}


/* OnPost */

.onPost .Blog {
    padding-top: 1rem;
    margin-top: 0.7rem;
}

/* LeftSidebar*/

.leftsidebar {
	position: sticky;
	height: 100%;
	top: 0;
}



/* Table of content */
.onPost .tableOfContainer {
	transition: var(--transition-1);
	-webkit-transition: var(--transition-1);
	padding-left: 1rem;
    padding-top: 3.5rem;
}

.onPost .tableOfContainer li {
    display: flex;
	padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.onPost .tableOfContainer li:before {
	font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: var(--semi-gray);
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    content: '0' counter(link);
    counter-increment: link;
    width: calc(25px + 1vh);
	flex-shrink: 0;
	margin-top: 2px;
}

.onPost .tableOfContainer a {
	opacity: 0.5;
    font-size: calc(0.4rem + 1vh);
	transition: var(--transition-1) !important;
	-webkit-transition: var(--transition-1) !important;
	padding-bottom: 0;
	padding-top:0;
}
.onPost .tableOfContainer a.active{
	opacity: 1;
}

.tableOfHeader span:before {
    content: attr(data-text);
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: var(--oswald-font);
	font-size: 1.5rem;
}
.tableOfHeader {
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.tableOfContainer ol {
	counter-reset: link;
    list-style-type: none;
}
.tableOfContainer .tableOfHeader:after{
	content:'';
	display: block;
	width: 18px;
	position: absolute;
   	border-bottom: 1px solid var(--semi-gray);	
}
nav[data-toggle="toc"] .nav-link + ol {
    display: none;
}

nav[data-toggle="toc"] .nav-link.active + ol {
    display: block;
}

/* Widget Social Media - leftsidebar */

/* widget LinkList1 */

#left-sidebar {
    align-self: flex-end;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
	display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

#left-sidebar:before {
    content: '';
    border-top: 1px solid var(--main-bg-color);
    position: absolute;
    width: 80%;
    opacity: 0.2;
}

#LinkList1 {
	padding-top: 1rem;
}

#LinkList1 ul {
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
	display: flex;
}

#LinkList1 li {
    padding-left: 1rem;
}

#LinkList1 path {
    fill: var(--main-bg-color);
}




/* Breadcrumb */

.breadcrumb {
	margin: 0;
	font-size: 0.7rem;
}
.breadcrumb a {
    color: inherit;
    text-transform: capitalize;
}

/* Post Article*/

.onPagePost .blog-posts h1 {
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    font-weight: bold;
}

.onPagePost .postBody img {
    border-radius: 5px;
}
.onPost .middlecontent {
	--bs-gutter-x: 2rem;
}
.onPost .middlecontent p{
	text-align: justify;
}

.onPagePost .postBody h1, .onPagePost .postBody h2, .onPagePost .postBody h3{
	color:var(--bg-main-color);
	font-family:var(--oswald-font);
	font-weight: bold;
}

.onPagePost .postBody p:before {
    content: '';
}

.onPagePost .postBody h4 {
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
}
.onPagePost .postBody h4 + p, .onPagePost .postBody h4, .onPagePost .postBody p:before  {
	padding-left: 2rem;

}

.onPagePost   li p:before {
    padding-left: 0 !important;
}

.onPagePost .postBody h3 {
	padding-top: 4rem;
	    margin-top: -3rem;
}


/* Post Article Info*/

.postInfo{
	padding-bottom: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
    padding-top: 0.5rem;
	display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;

}

.postAuthor {
    display: flex;
}

.postAuthor .postAuthorImage {
    padding-right: 0.5rem;
}

.postAuthorName .authorName:before {
    content: attr(data-write);

}
.onPagePost .postAuthorName .authorName:before, .onPagePost .postAuthorName .authorName > *:before, .onPagePost .postTimes span,.onPagePost .postTimes a, .nameandate .authorName, .nameandate .postDatetime{
	opacity: .7;
    font-size: 10pt;
    color: inherit;
}
.postAuthorImage .authorImage { 
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}

.postAuthorImage .authorImage, .postComments > * {
	width: 47px;
    height: 47px;
	border-radius: 50%;
}
.postAuthorName .authorName {
    max-width: 170px;
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
}
.postAuthorName .authorName > *:before , .nameandate .authorName:before, .authorInfo .authorAbout:before{
    content: attr(data-text);
    text-transform: capitalize;
}

.postTimes {
    display: flex;
	margin-top:-3px;
}

.postTimes .postTimestamp:after {
    display: inline;
}
.postTimestamp:after {
	content: attr(data-text);
    line-height: 20px;
    white-space: nowrap;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    overflow: hidden;
    opacity: .8;
}
.postInfo #readTime:before, .nameandate .postDatetime:before{
    content: '\2022';
    margin: 0 5px;
}

/* Post share button*/

.postComments svg {
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    margin: 0;
}
.darkMode svg.line {
	stroke: var(--bs-white);
}
svg.line{
    fill: none!important;
    stroke: var(--bs-gray-dark);
    stroke-linecap: round;
    stroke-linejoin: round;
    stroke-width: 1;
}
.postComments, .postTimes > * {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-shrink: 0;
}

.postComments > * {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--bs-gray-dark);
    position: relative;
    opacity: .5;
	cursor: pointer;
	transition: var(--transition-1);
	-webkit-transition:var(--transition-1);
}

.darkMode .postComments > *:hover, .darkMode .postComments > *{
	border-color: var(--bs-white);
}

.postComments > *:hover {
	border-color: var(--bs-gray-dark);
	opacity: .8;
}

#shareBut {
    bottom: 20vh;
    border: 0;
    right: calc(35% + 5vw);
    left: calc(35% + 5vw);
    height: 60vh;
    z-index: 1053;
	background-color: unset;
}
#shareBut .header-share{
	padding: 0.8rem 1.2rem;
	display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
	border-top-left-radius: 10px;
    border-top-right-radius: 10px;
}

#shareBut .header-text-share {
	color: var(--main-bg-color);
    font-weight: bold;
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    font-size: 1.2rem;
}

#shareBut .body-share, #shareBut .header-share {
    background-color: var(--bs-white);
}

#shareBut .body-share{
	border-bottom-right-radius: 10px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 10px;
}

#shareBut ~ .modal-backdrop {
    z-index: 1052;
}

.btn-close:focus {
	 box-shadow: unset;
}

.header-text-share:before, .sharePreview .previewTitle:before, .sharePreview .previewLabel > *:before{
	content: attr(data-text);
}
.sharePreview {
	padding: 15px 20px;
	border: 1px solid var(--border-white);
	border-left: 0;
	border-right: 0;
	display: flex;
	align-items: center;
}

.sharePreview .previewImg {
	width: 70px;
    height: 70px;
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.03);
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    border-radius: 5px;
    margin-right: 15px;
}

.sharePreview .previewTitle {
	font-size: 20px;
	font-family: var(--oswald-font);
	font-weight: lighter;
	color: var(--main-bg-color);
}
.sharePreview .previewLabel {
    font-size: 12px;
    opacity: .7;
	color: var(--main-bg-color);
}
#shareBut ul {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

#shareBut li {
    width: 33.3333%;
    text-align: center;
}
#shareBut li a:hover, #shareBut li .copyLink:hover {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.03);
}
#shareBut li a, #shareBut li .copyLink {
    display: block;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 15px 0;
    border-radius: 2px;
    color: inherit;
}
#shareBut li > * svg {
    width: 26px;
    height: 26px;
    opacity: .8;
	fill: var(--bs-gray-dark);
}

#shareBut svg.line {
    stroke-width: 1.5;
}
#shareBut li input {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    outline: 0;
    border: 0;
    width: 1px;
    height: 0;
    opacity: 0;
}

#shareBut .shareNotif span {
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: -70px;
    font-size: 90%;
    display: block;
    width: 240px;
    margin: 0 auto 20px;
    padding: 15px 10px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,.8);
    color: #fefefe;
    line-height: 20px;
    text-align: center;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: var(--transition-1);
    -webkit-animation: slidein 2s ease forwards;
    animation: slidein 2s ease forwards;
}
#shareBut li a:after, #shareBut li .copyLink:after {
    content: attr(data-text);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 3px;
    font-size: 12px;
    opacity: .7;
}

/*Popular Post*/

.rightsidebar {
    padding-top: 1.5rem;
}

#PopularPosts00 {
	padding-top: 2.3rem;
}

#PopularPosts00 h2.title {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    font-size: 1.5rem;
}

#PopularPosts00 h2.title:after {
 	content: '';
    display: block;
    width: 18px;
    position: absolute;
    border-bottom: 1px
 	solid var(--semi-gray);
	padding-top: 3.1px;
}

#PopularPosts00 .widget-content {
    padding-top: 1rem;
}
#PopularPosts00 .postAuthorName .authorName:before {
	content:'';
}

#PopularPosts00 .postAuthorName {
    display: flex;
}

#PopularPosts00 .authorName:after {
	content: '';
    margin: 0 5px; 
}
#PopularPosts00 article {
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

#PopularPosts00 .itemInfo.postInfo {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
}


.itemPopulars {
    padding-left: 1rem;
    margin-left: 0.5rem;
}

#PopularPosts00 .itemTitle {
	font-size: calc(0.7rem + 1vh);
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
	margin: 0;
}

#PopularPosts00 .itemTitle a {
    color: inherit;
}

#PopularPosts00 .homeLabel:before {
	content: '';
}

/* Related Post */

.relatedPosts h4 {
    font-family: var(--oswald-font);
    font-weight: bold;
}

/* Author Profile */

.postAuthors {
    padding: 0.4rem;
    border: 1px solid #0000004d;
    border-radius: 2px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row;
}

.postAuthors >* {
    padding: 0 1rem 0 0;
}

.postAuthors .authorImage {
	align-self: center;
}

.authorImage .authorImg {
    width: 47px;
    height: 47px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
}

.postAuthors .nameandate {
	display:flex;
}

.authorInfo .authorAbout {
    font-size: 10pt;
    font-style: italic;

}



@media (max-width: 1399.98px) {
		#shareBut{
	    right: calc(30% + 5vw);
		left: calc(30% + 5vw);
   		}

}

@media (max-width: 1199.98px) {
	#shareBut{
	    right: calc(25% + 5vw);
		left: calc(25% + 5vw);
   		}

}

@media (max-width: 991.98px) {
	.onPost .tableOfContainer li:before {
		content: unset;
	}
}


@media (max-width: 767.98px){
	#shareBut{
	    right: calc(15% + 5vw);
		left: calc(15% + 5vw);
   		}
}

@media print {
	#Header1 h1, .postInfo, nav[aria-label='breadcrumb']{ 
		display:none;
	}
}


/* Keyframes Animation */
@-webkit-keyframes slidein{
	0%{opacity:0}
	20%{opacity:1;bottom:0}
	50%{opacity:1;bottom:0}
	80%{opacity:1;bottom:0}
	100%{opacity:0;bottom:-70px;visibility:hidden}} 
@keyframes slidein{
	0%{opacity:0}
	20%{opacity:1;bottom:0}
	50%{opacity:1;bottom:0}
	80%{opacity:1;bottom:0}
	100%{opacity:0;bottom:-70px;visibility:hidden}} 



@media (min-width: 576px){
	.onIndex #Blog1{
		max-width: 540px;
	}
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
	.onIndex #Blog1{
		max-width: 720px;
	}

}
@media (min-width: 992px) {
	.onIndex #Blog1{
		max-width: 960px;
	}
	.onIndex .blog-posts>* {
    	flex: 0 0 auto;
    	width: 33.3333333333%;
	}
}
@media (min-width: 1200px){
	.onIndex #Blog1{
    	max-width: 1140px;
	}
	
}

@media (min-width: 1400px){
	.onIndex #Blog1{
    	max-width: 1320px;
	}
}

      /**/
    
  
    /**/

/*Show Mini Header*/

	$(window).scroll(function() {
		let scroll = $(window).scrollTop();
		if (scroll > 500) {
			$("#navigation").addClass("mini-header");
			$("#minitoggle").addClass("top");
    		}
		if (scroll < 300) {
        	$("#navigation").removeClass("mini-header");
			$("#minitoggle").removeClass("top");
      }
	});

/*Tooggle OutCanvas Animation*/
	
	$(document).ready(function () {
    	var myOffcanvas = document.getElementById('outCanvas')
    	myOffcanvas.addEventListener('shown.bs.offcanvas', function () {
        	$(".nav-toggle").addClass("expanded");
    	})
    	myOffcanvas.addEventListener('hidden.bs.offcanvas', function () {
        	$(".nav-toggle").removeClass("expanded");
    	})
	});

//disable button search if no input
$(document).ready(function() {
     $(':button[type="submit"]').prop('disabled', true);
     $('input[type="text"]').keyup(function() {
        if($(this).val() != '') {
      		$(':button[type="submit"]').prop('disabled', false);     
        }
	});
	
});

//function for custom link
function timeLink(linkClass,linkPath,link){
  	var linkdata = document.getElementById(linkClass);
  	var taglink = '<a href="'+linkPath +'" >'+link+'</a>';
  	linkdata.innerHTML = taglink;
}

                    /**/ 
	function get_text(el) {
		ret = ""; 
		var length = el.childNodes.length; 
		for(var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
			var node = el.childNodes[i]; 
			if(node.nodeType != 8) {ret += node.nodeType != 1 ? node.nodeValue : get_text(node);} } 
		return ret;} 
	var words = get_text(document.getElementById('postBody')); 
	var count = words.split(' ').length; var avg = 200; 
	var counted = count / avg; 
	var maincount = Math.round(counted); 
	document.getElementById("readTime").innerHTML = maincount + " minute read"; /**/

            /**/ 

$('input.switch:checkbox').change(function(){
    if($(this).is(":checked")) {
        $('body').addClass("darkMode");
    } else {
        $('body').removeClass("darkMode");
    }
});

function listMode(){localStorage.setItem("list","listmode"===localStorage.getItem("list")?"grid":"listmode"),"listmode"===localStorage.getItem("list")?document.querySelector("#mainContent").classList.add("listMode"):document.querySelector("#mainContent").classList.remove("listMode")}; 

function copyFunction(){document.getElementById("getlink").select(),document.execCommand("copy"),document.getElementById("shareNotif").innerHTML="<span>Link copied!</span>" };

( function() {var youtube = document.querySelectorAll(".lazyYoutube"); for (var i = 0; i < youtube.length; i++) {var source = "https://img.youtube.com/vi/"+ youtube[i].dataset.embed +"/sddefault.jpg"; var image = new Image(); image.setAttribute("class", "lazy"); image.setAttribute("data-src",source); image.setAttribute("src","data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="); image.setAttribute("alt","Youtube video"); image.addEventListener( "load", function() {youtube[ i ].appendChild( image );}( i ) ); youtube[i].addEventListener( "click", function() {var iframe = document.createElement( "iframe" ); iframe.setAttribute( "frameborder", "0" ); iframe.setAttribute( "allowfullscreen", "" ); iframe.setAttribute( "src", "https://www.youtube.com/embed/"+ this.dataset.embed +"?rel=0&showinfo=0&autoplay=1" ); this.innerHTML = ""; this.appendChild( iframe ); }); }; })(); /**/
